--- In gladiator@y..., Bjorn Hansen <perfidious@a...> wrote:
> hmm,  apparently for a while there my server was bouncing these 
messages.  
> Anyway did i miss anything really important?

Let me think about all you missed: the end of the world and the end of 
time.

Just joking.

Seriously, we are having a weekly evaluation of characters now as we 
work our way through evaluating all of the characters.  See message 
#1231 for a list of topics that I am going through for the upcoming 
weeks.  There is a new poll out.

The editor project hasn't gone anywhere.  The 50 Project has been put 
on hold so that the tournament group can get some help working on a 
plot for the tournament scenarios.  Note: that's what the poll is 
about: whether or not the tournament scenarios NEED a plot.

As soon as the tournament group gets over the plot problem for the 
tournament scenarios, I plan on starting up on the 50 Project Again.  
I am pretty happy with the proposed plotline so far (I'll forward it 
to the list at that time).
